function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emission of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) from finishing materials and furnishings","Impact":"Potential health hazards due to exposure to VOCs","Mitigation":"Use of innovative materials with reduced VOC emissions and eco-friendly treatments","Technologies":"Eco-active materials, photocatalytic paints","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Designers, architects, building owners"},{"Description":"Persistence of viruses on inanimate surfaces","Impact":"Risk of viral transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, use of materials with anti-viral properties","Technologies":"Anti-viral materials, disinfection technologies","People":"Building occupants, visitors, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, cleaning staff"}]}
